name: President Evil [Demo]
description:
Scientists alerted authorities of a new deadly virus that could disrupt society.

Mankind took too long to respond and the virus made its way across the globe. While some leaders decided to finally heed the advices from experts, one president is determined to let his constituents die.

This is where you live. It sucks.

A shipment of vaccines was dropped nearby. This is your chance to save your loved ones!

IF ANTIVIRUS FLAGS THE .EXE, TRY THE ZIP VERSION!
